CustomField.description: The current RAG status of this advice based on the status and the SLA that applies to that. Blank if not SLA applies.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(OW_status_sla__c), "",
IF( TODAY() > OW_status_due_date__c, IMAGE("https://img.icons8.com/emoji/48/000000/red-circle-emoji.png", "Red",30, 30),
IF(TODAY() > OW_amber_date__c, IMAGE("https://img.icons8.com/emoji/48/000000/orange-circle-emoji.png", "Amber",30, 30),
IMAGE("https://img.icons8.com/emoji/48/000000/green-circle-emoji.png", "Green", 30, 30))))
CustomField.label: RAG
